Literature.Title: Biochemical and molecular identification of a novel hepcidin type 2-like antimicrobial peptide in the skin mucus of the pufferfish Takifugu pardalis.
Literature.Author: Go HJ, Kim CH, Park JB, Kim TY, Lee TK, Oh HY, Park NG

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1021(MEC=3.5µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1021(MEC=>500µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis KCTC 1021(MEC=>1000µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus KCTC 1621(MEC=28.1µg/ml),Streptococcus iniae FD 5228(MEC=39.4µg/ml),Micrococcus luteus KCTC 1071(MEC=24.72µg/ml),Lactococcus garvieae ATCC 49156(MEC=23.02µg/ml),Escherichia coli D31(MEC=1.7µg/ml),Escherichia coli D31(MEC=9.01µg/ml),Escherichia coli D31(MEC=>500µg/ml),Escherichia coli D31(MEC=>1000µg/ml),Aeromonas hydrophila KCTC 2358(MEC=36µg/ml),Edwardsiella tarda KCTC 12267(MEC=17.6µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 13311(MEC=2.4µg/ml),Vibrio anguillarum KCTC 2711(MEC=4.8µg/ml),Shigella sonnei KCTC 2009(MEC=3.64µg/ml),Shigella flexneri KCTC 2517(MEC=2.89µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 2004(MEC=4.47µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae KCTC 1685(MEC=13.68µg/ml),Candida albicans KCTC 7965(MEC=3.02µg/ml),Candida albicans KCTC 7965(MEC=20.39µg/ml),Candida albicans KCTC 7965(MEC=>500µg/ml),Candida albicans KCTC 7965(MEC=>1000µg/ml)
